item.title: Sweetalert
item.description: Used for displaying a dialog box to the user. Appears in the center of the screen with one or more options. In most cases, the alert must be dismissed by the user.

item.title: Snackbar
item.description: Used for displaying in place and immediate feedback. Appears at the bottom of the screen for a short period of time and then disappears. Include the element in your layout file: The element is already included in the standard TouchPoint layout. <div class="snackbar"></div> Include the script: The script is already included in the standard TouchPoint layout. @Fingerprint.Script("/Content/touchpoint/js/snackbar.js") Use the snackbar in an AJAX form: The error state will display a sweetalert.
